channel.title: Michelle Rempel
channel.description: Recent news about Michelle Rempel, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Over the last month I've had over 100 meetings. @RonCannan wins #bestagenda. http://t.co/3xs0gv1YoA

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Met with Bill at The Jammery in #kelowna today - heard how @Comm_FuturesBC gave him the springboard to create 30 jobs for the community.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Impressed with the operations of Kelowna Flightcraft - another example of western Cda's successful aerospace sector. #thewestmeansbusiness

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Enjoyed meeting representatives from the Westbank First Nations today - many shared economic development priorities. #thewestmeansbusiness

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Up bright and early for another day of econ development mtgs in the BC interior.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: And in other news, just found out @insleynicholas plays in a bagpipe band. #thingsididntknow?

item.title: Mentioned by Castanet.net
item.description:
Photo: Ragnar Haagen - Kelowna
(L-R) MP Ron Cannan, Michelle Rempel Minister of State for Western Economic Diversification, Robert Hobson Regional District of Central Okanagan Chair, Mayor James Baker deliver the news. ​Today, the Honourable Michelle Rempel, Minister of State for Western Economic Diversification, along with the Honourable Ron Cannan, Member of Parliament for Kelowna—Lake Country, announced support for improvements to the Okanagan Centre Safe Harbour Regional Park's breakwater under the Community ...

item.title: Mentioned by Kelowna Capital News
item.description:
Okanagan Centre safe harbour gets $150000 in gov't money
Federal MP Michelle Rempel, the Minster of State for Western Economic Diversification, announces $150,000 for improvements to the Okanagan Safe Harbour Regional Park in Lake Country, while fellow politicians Ron Cannan, Robert Hobson and James ...

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Why You Should Never Ask An MP About Her Hair
Later, McGregor decided to ask another MP, Michelle Rempel -- who, like Adams, is young, telegenic, Conservative and female -- about whether she also expensed hair care products. McGregor asked Rempel the question in the House of Commons foyer, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Calgary Herald
item.description:
Calgary MP Rempel touts better market access for energy resources
Newly appointed cabinet minister Michelle Rempel pressed the case Wednesday for improving market access for Canadian energy resources, while warning the debate over new pipelines shouldn't devolve into one of “good versus evil.” Elevated last week to ...

item.title: Mentioned by Western Producer (subscription)
item.description:
Harper deals major cabinet shuffle
Michelle Rempel, MP for Calgary Centre-North, is sworn in as minister of state for western economic diversification during a ceremony at Rideau Hall in Ottawa July 15. Agriculture minister Gerry Ritz maintains his post following the federal cabinet shuffle.

item.title: Mentioned by Ottawa Citizen
item.description:
New, familiar faces alike expected in Harper's long-awaited cabinet overhaul
Conservative MP Michelle Rempel responds to a question in Ottawa on June 11, 2013. Rempel is among the new additions to cabinet, Conservative sources familiar with the changes told The Canadian Press. THE CANADIAN PRESS/Sean Kilpatrick.
